title: Wall Connector
description: Charge at home, anytime. Tesla Wall Connector provides a full charge overnight for every homeowner.

title: Cable Organizer
description: Store your Tesla Mobile Connector cables with the newly redesigned Cable Organizer.

title: Corded Mobile Connector
description: Corded Mobile Connector features a NEMA 14-50 plug and improved charging speeds

title: NEMA Adapter Bundle
description: With all seven Gen 2 NEMA adapters in one convenient storage bag, you can charge at any available outlet, at home or on the road.

title: Gen 1 NEMA Adapters
description: Use a variety of household outlets to charge your Tesla with a Gen 1 NEMA Adapter.

title: Automatic Garage Opener
description: Come and go with easy access. Connect Model 3 to your garage door, gate system and other radio-frequency (RF) controlled devices with the fully integrated Homelink module.

title: Model 3 Key Fob
description: No hands required. Locking and unlocking your Model 3 has never been easier.

title: Model 3 Wireless Phone Charger
description: Stay charged with the Model 3 Wireless Phone Charger designed exclusively by Tesla.

title: Model 3 Aero Wheel Cove
description: Original equipped cover for Model 3 18 Aero Wheel

title: Model S Wiper Blades
description: To ensure maximum performance, correct fitment, and visual clarity replace your Model S wiper blades with genuine replacements

title: Model 3 Carpet Interior Mats
description: Model 3 Carpet Interior Mats offer comfortable floor protection with a thick, durable pile and come treated for stain and soil resistance

title: T Logo Hat
description: Classic shaped hat with unstructured body and curved visor, featuring Tesla T logo.

title: Men's Corp Jacket
description: Fully customized and uniquely styled, the Tesla Corp Jacket features a silicone-printed T logo.

title: Large Wordmark Pullover Hoodie
description: The Large Wordmark Pullover Hoodie features soft fleece and an adjustable

title: Powerbank
description: You can now become a Tesla owner without spending the big bucks

title: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: The new Tesla stainless steel water bottle is a conveniently sized, insulated water bottle.
